name: The Deepest Hope
description:
The people of the future were overtaken by a technological catastrophe, survival on the surface became almost impossible.

To survive difficult times, people began to build underground cities for survival.
Today, a giant drilling rig will bring people to the city completed by drones.
It remains only to get to it ...

Controls: W A S D to move

Don't forgot, you have Upgrades button in game :D
